snippet.title: BeatNiks Official Trailer - Meet the BeatNiks!
snippet.description:
BeatNiks, the first virtual musical pet game, is available now on iOS and Android!
Download on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/beatniks/id982077943?ls=1&mt=8 
Download on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.harmonixmusic.beatniks 

Create and adopt your own BeatNik, the first pet made from the music you love. Feed it, dress it, clean it, tickle it, play with it, and make it grow into an adorable monster!

Pick from a wide selection of music-inspired clothes and accessories to make it your very own unique friend. Play mini-games with it and keep your BeatNik happy. Your BeatNik loves your music, make sure you love it back!

Follow us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/beatniksgame
For more details visit http://www.beatniksgame.com
